metadata.title: CVE-2018-20148 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, contributors could conduct PHP object injection attacks via crafted metadata in a wp.getMediaItem XMLRPC call. This is caused by mishandling of serialized data at phar:// URLs in the wp_get_attachment_thumb_file function in wp-includes/post.php.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.1+dfsg1-1').
